name: Donation Platform
description: A Laravel-based donation platform with multi-language support (Arabic/English), admin dashboard, and comprehensive project management system
features: Admin dashboard with statistics and analytics
admin_features: Project management (create, read, update, delete, restore)

localization_requirements.respect_ar_json_en_json: Always use ar.json and en.json content according to current user locale
localization_requirements.translation_keys: Use __() helper function with proper translation keys
localization_requirements.locale_switching: Respect user's chosen locale throughout the application
localization_requirements.rtl_ltr_support: Full support for Arabic (RTL) and English (LTR) layouts

ui_spacing_guidelines.icon_text_spacing: Always use minimum mx-1 spacing between icons and text
ui_spacing_guidelines.recommended_spacing: Use mr-4/ml-4 for better visual hierarchy
ui_spacing_guidelines.rtl_compatibility: Ensure proper spacing works in both RTL and LTR layouts
ui_spacing_guidelines.responsive_spacing: Maintain consistent spacing across all screen sizes

development_notes.soft_deletes: Implemented for projects with restore functionality

design_system.admin_panel: Tailwind CSS with modern UI/UX design patterns
design_system.components: Custom Tailwind components with gradients and animations
design_system.color_scheme: Modern gradients (blue, purple, emerald, amber, red)
design_system.icons: Font Awesome with proper spacing (mr-4/mx-2 for RTL/LTR)
design_system.layout: Card-based grid layouts with hover effects
design_system.animations: Smooth transitions, hover scales, and loading states
